named-query.name: MonitorInfo.findBylogFormatId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfo a WHERE a.logFormatId = :logFormatId

named-query.name: LogFormat.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM LogFormat a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.logFormatId

named-query.name: LogFormat.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM LogFormat a ORDER BY a.logFormatId

named-query.name: TransferInfo.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TransferInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.transferId

named-query.name: TransferInfo.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TransferInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.transferId

named-query.name: TransferInfo.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM TransferInfo a ORDER BY a.transferId

named-query.name: CollectStringKeyInfo.findMaxId
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.collectId) FROM CollectStringKeyInfo a

named-query.name: CollectStringKeyInfo.findId
named-query.query: SELECT a.collectId FROM CollectStringKeyInfo a WHERE a.collectId = :collectId

named-query.name: CollectStringData.findMaxDataId
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.id.dataId) FROM CollectStringData a

named-query.name: CollectStringData.findMaxDataId2
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.id.dataId) FROM CollectStringData a

named-query.name: CollectStringData.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM CollectStringData a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.tagList WHERE a.id.dataId > :prevlast AND a.id.dataId <= :last AND a.id.collectId IN :collectIds ORDER BY a.id.dataId

named-query.name: CollectStringData.transfer.delay
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM CollectStringData a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.tagList WHERE a.id.dataId > :prevlast AND a.id.dataId <= :last AND (a.time + :delay) < :current AND a.id.collectId IN :collectIds ORDER BY a.id.dataId

named-query.name: CollectStringKeyInfo.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM CollectStringKeyInfo k WHERE k.id.monitorId IN :monitorIds

named-query.name: CollectData.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectIds ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: CollectData.transfer.delay
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.id.time + :delay) < :current AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectIds ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: CollectKeyInfo.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT k FROM CollectKeyInfo k WHERE k.id.monitorId IN :monitorIds

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM EventLogEntity a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.id.monitorId IN :monitorIds OR (:admin IS NOT NULL OR a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId)) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.transfer.only_ownerrole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM EventLogEntity a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.transfer.delay
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM EventLogEntity a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.generationDate + :delay) < :current AND (a.id.monitorId IN :monitorIds OR (:admin IS NOT NULL OR a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId)) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: EventLogEntity.transfer.delay.only_ownerrole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM EventLogEntity a WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.generationDate + :delay) < :current AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.transfer
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM JobSessionEntity a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.jobSessionJobEntities AS b LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobSessionNodeEntities LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobInfoEntity WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.jobunitId IN :jobunitIds OR (b.id.jobunitId = '_ROOT_' AND b.id.jobId = 'TOP' AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR b.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId))) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.transfer.only_ownerrole
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM JobSessionEntity a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.jobSessionJobEntities AS b LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobSessionNodeEntities LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobInfoEntity WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND b.id.jobunitId = '_ROOT_' AND b.id.jobId = 'TOP' AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR b.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.transfer.delay
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM JobSessionEntity a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.jobSessionJobEntities AS b LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobSessionNodeEntities LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobInfoEntity WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.scheduleDate + :delay) < :current AND (a.jobunitId IN :jobunitIds OR (b.id.jobunitId = '_ROOT_' AND b.id.jobId = 'TOP' AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR b.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId))) ORDER BY a.position

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.transfer.delay.only_ownerrole
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM JobSessionEntity a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.jobSessionJobEntities AS b LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobSessionNodeEntities LEFT JOIN FETCH b.jobInfoEntity WHERE a.position > :prevlast AND a.position <= :last AND (a.scheduleDate + :delay) < :current AND b.id.jobunitId = '_ROOT_' AND b.id.jobId = 'TOP' AND (:admin IS NOT NULL OR b.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId) ORDER BY a.position
